Method Detail

addLocalDependency

DependencySpec.DependencyBuilder addLocalDependency(LocalDependencySpec spec)
Add a non-module local dependency. See the documentation for LocalLoader for more information about non-module dependencies.

It is recommended that rather than including non-module dependencies in one or more module definitions, a module should be defined to encapsulate the non-module dependency, so that other modules can depend on it as a module.

Specified by:
addLocalDependency in interface DependencySpec.DependencyBuilderBase
Parameters:
spec - the specification for the local dependency
Returns:
this builder

addLocalDependency

DependencySpec.DependencyBuilder addLocalDependency()
Add a local dependency representing the module itself. If not specified, the module is assumed to be the last dependency (child-last). This dependency includes all of the resource roots defined by #addResourceRoot(ResourceLoader). It is an error to add this dependency more than one time.

Specified by:
addLocalDependency in interface DependencySpec.DependencyBuilderBase
Returns:
this builder

addModuleDependency

DependencySpec.DependencyBuilder addModuleDependency(ModuleDependencySpec dependencySpec)
Add a module dependency with the given specification.

Specified by:
addModuleDependency in interface DependencySpec.DependencyBuilderBase
Parameters:
dependencySpec - the dependency specification (see ModuleDependencySpec.build(ModuleIdentifier))
Returns:
this builder

create

Creates the dependency specification from this builder

Returns:
the dependecy spec
